title: Quick And Simple Hydroponic Tomato Setup!  #hydroponics #tomato #indoorgardening

tasks.task: Setting up a plant in a net cup
subtasks: Select the appropriate net cup size (three inches)
Ensure a few roots are visible at the bottom of the net cup
Use clay balls (pebbles) to stabilize the plant

tasks.task: Deploying light protection for the nutrient water
subtasks: Position clay pebbles around the plant to block light from reaching the nutrient water
